songs.title: Hooker
songs.lyrics:
Baby gil know she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
Bringing the pimp in the cave
She’s a hooker‚ She’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know‚ know‚ know  she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave
Know, know‚ know she’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know, know, know  she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker‚ She’s a hooker
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave

Hoe come with me
And let me manage it
I only want to add
To your benefit
I know exactly
What we finna get
It’s a heavy work load
But you can handle it
I’m about to pick you up
So you can walk the strip
Head down bitch
Only talk to tricks
Catch you out of pocket
Gonna bust your lip
Follow my instructions
30 racks on the rib

Some of these hoes
Man they often slip
How the convoys
Supposed to talk to pimps
Peel her purse back
Then check for chips
One little slip
They can come off your grip

Let it be my money
I ain’t giving no pass
Got me rolling fast
With my foot
On  the gas
Now I got no money
Trying to put in a stash

You gonna catch these hands
With a foot up your ass

She’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
Bringing the pimp in the cave
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know, know, know  she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave


Watch me do some popping
Then I’m gonna take you shopping
Then we gonna hit Long Beach and Compton
Gotta get this money hoe
It ain’t no stopping
I’m a young mac lord
And pimping’s a doctrine
It ain’t  by force bitch
Hoe-ing’s an option
I got a license
To put a hoe in the auction

From the boulevard to the blade in Stockton
I ain’t gotta mac a hoe
I”m just pinching the gospel
Dope dope competition
Man it ain’t no race
Stable’s so full
That it ain’t no space
Cross country pimping
But I ain’t no take
Bitch keep her mouth closed
And it ain’t no case
Now you can beat your feet
And go get this bread
Yes daddy only thing
This bitch said
Hit the blade once
And this bitch fled
When I catch up to her
She gonna get this lead

I got ten of the finest hoes
In the world working for me
And I’m gonna get $100 a day
From each one
Goalie get off my ass
With the pimping

Baby girl know she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker
Bringing the pimp in the cave
Steady bringing the pimp in the cave
Constantly walking that blade
Baby girl know, know, know  she’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
She’s a hooker, She’s a hooker
